mean_en: a country consisting of a group of individual states that have control over their own affairs but are controlled by a central government for national decisions, etc.; a group of clubs, trade/labor unions, etc. that have joined together to form an organization; the act of forming a federation
sentence: Moscow is the capital city of the Russian Federation.
sentence_trans: 莫斯科是俄罗斯联邦的首都。
word_etyma: feder联盟 + ation表名词 → 联盟，联合会
